td.content: s:a white male aged 75 years c/o 11 days h/o mild vague postprandial epigastric pain, moderate weight loss over several months, moderate vomiting and Cancer. NKDA. drinks daily Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54.4 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

s:patient presents without specific complaints. pt denies weight loss over several months, vague postprandial epigastric pain and vomiting. patient is a white m aged 75 years. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54.4 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed.

s:a white male aged 75 yrs presents with moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. patient also reports of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54.5 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

s:pt presents with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. he has history of moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. patient is a white M retired aged 75 Ys. denies any smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in his past o:Height 162 cm, Weight 52.8 kg, Temperature 36.5 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:male aged 75 Ys presents with 2 years history of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. he denies ever using cigarettes he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.
